DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select Convert(varchar, T.TransactionDateTime, 20) as [Transaction Date Time], S.SaleCode as [Sale Code (PNR)], L.AccountCode as [Location Code], L.DisplayName as [Location Name], OA.AccountCode as [Operating Area Code], OA.DisplayName as [Operating Area Name], W.WorkstationCode as [Workstation Code], W.WorkstationName as [Workstation Name], Convert(varchar, T.TransactionFiscalDate, 103) as [Transaction Fiscal Date], T.TransactionSerial as [Transaction Serial], dbo.fnEntityDesc(20,T.TransactionId) as [Transaction TDSSN], P.ProductCode as [Product Code], P.ProductName as [Product Name], T.PaidAmount as [Transaction Amount], Sum(TI.QtyPaid * SID.DiscountAmount) as [Total Discount] from tbTransaction T inner join tbTransactionItem TI on TI.TransactionId=T.TransactionId inner join tbSaleItemDiscount SID on SID.SaleItemId=TI.SaleItemId inner join tbProduct P on P.ProductId=SID.PromoProductId inner join tbSale S on S.SaleId=T.SaleId inner join tbWorkstation W on W.WorkstationId=T.WorkstationId inner join tbAccount OA on OA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId inner join tbAccount L on L.AccountId=OA.ParentAccountId where T.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and T.TransactionFiscalDate<=:@DateTo and TI.QtyPaid<>0 and (:@OpAreaId is null or :@OpAreaId = OA.AccountId) and (:@LocationId is null or :@LocationId = L.AccountId) group by T.TransactionDateTime, S.SaleCode, L.AccountCode, L.DisplayName, OA.AccountCode, OA.DisplayName, W.WorkstationCode, W.WorkstationName, T.TransactionFiscalDate, T.TransactionSerial, T.TransactionId, P.ProductCode, P.ProductName, T.PaidAmount order by T.TransactionDateTime

RichDescItem.Description:
Discounts Detail Report

Abstract

“Discounts Detail” generates the log of all applied discounts with details by selected Location, Operating Area, User and Workstation in a period of time at your choice sorted by Transaction Date and Time​​​​​​​.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by

  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select. Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  • [Location] – Site Location Name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the locations
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the Operating Areas
 
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.​​​​​​​
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] - Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected analysis period.
  • [Location] – Site Location Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE LOCATION CODE] Site Location Name".Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the  Locations' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [Operating Area] – Site Operating Area Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE OPERATING AREA CODE] Site Operating Area Name". Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the  Operating Area' exposure are analysed and listed

Contents (by Colums)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Transaction Date Time] – Transaction execution Date and Time. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [Sale Code (PNR)] - Reservation number/PNR
  • [Location Code] - Site Location Code
  • [Location Name] - Site Location Name
  • [Operating Area Code] - Site Operating Area Code
  • [Operating Area Name] - Site Operating Area Name
  • [Workstation Code] – Workstation Code
  • [Workstation Name] – Workstation Name
  • [Transaction Fiscal Date] - Transaction Fiscal date. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation] It could be different from Sale Date
  • [Daily Transaction Serial Number] - Daily Transaction Serial Number (counter reset every day)      
  • [Transaction TDSSN] – Unique Transaction Serial Number, format “T:licence_number.workstation_number.YYDDMM.daily_serial_number”
  • [Product Code] – Product Code
  • [Product Name] – Product Name
  • [Transaction Amount] - Total Transition Amount, in local currency
  • [Total Discount] - Total Discount applied per Transaction, in local currency
